references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper is foundational for score-based generative models by establishing the connection between deep learning and non-equilibrium thermodynamics.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a significant advancement in generative modeling that has influenced many subsequent works including the current paper.

references.paper_title: Generative modeling by estimating gradients of the data distribution
references.reason: This paper established the foundation for score-based generative modeling by showing that the data distribution can be learned by estimating the gradients of the data distribution.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper provided a continuous-time framework for score-based generative models using stochastic differential equations which is extended by this paper.

references.paper_title: Affine representations of fractional processes with applications in mathematical finance
references.reason: This paper provides the mathematical foundation for the Markov approximation of fractional Brownian motion used in the current paper.
